description:
British expat Lady seeking Older battle worn Knight. Loves the countryside, horses, farming, cattle, dinner parties, gatherings with friends and family,. Opera, concerts, reading, stories by the the fire and of course candle light, making love in a storm. (er inside a cosy bed, not actually in the storm.....) 

Born in London educated in South East asia and europe due to my father's work for the government. Old school codes yet have big sense of humour and fun. Strong minded organised, Been single for 9 years due to divorce and taking care of my youngest son. Ready for that last leg of life with an amazing bright attractive strong old fashioned well heeled successful man. willing to relocate. Currently in South America finishing off a research/writing project.
